title: At the ballpark during the game
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/CLUBTOOLS-1486

As a fan attending an event who loves My History & free stuff from offers, I want the current game added to my history and all the offers unlocked when I’m in the ballpark

GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time AND also prior to after 6 hrs of game time (can be mocked)

NOTE: Auto Check-in feature is ticket agnostic, meaning that expected behavior should be verified both with AND without tickets
custom_steps: WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
custom_expected: THEN the user should be automatically checked-in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
AND the user does NOT have tickets for the event intended to check-in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page 

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

custom_steps_separated.content: (note: if using the same account to verify with and without tickets, ensure that the event check-in has been removed/deleted, prior to proceeding)

WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
AND the user has tickets for the event intended to check-in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page 

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

title: At the ballpark before/after the game's eligibility window (configurable)
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/CLUBTOOLS-1486

As a fan attending an event who loves My History & free stuff from offers, I want the current game added to my history and all the offers unlocked when I’m in the ballpark

GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur, EXCEPT within 3 hrs of device time, prior to after 6 hrs of game time

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the venue within configurable time [3 hrs of device time AND also prior to after 6 hrs of game time] (can be mocked)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user open the app to Home Page outside of the the eligible window 

** initial - [3 hrs of device time AND also prior to after 6 hrs of game time], adjust steps/validation based as configured
custom_expected: THEN the user should NOT be automatically checked-in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device time is more than 3 hrs prior to start time
AND the user open the app to Home Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is NOT shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc. (not to be shown)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is NOT shown the event listed in the user's history

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device time is more than 6 hrs after start time
AND the user open the app to Home Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is NOT shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc. (not to be shown)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is NOT shown the event listed in the user's history

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device time is 5hrs and 55 mins after start time
AND the user open the app to Home Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

custom_steps_separated.content: (note: if using the same account to verify the boundary window times, ensure that the event check-in has been removed/deleted, prior to proceeding)

WHEN the device time is 2hrs and 55 mins prior to start time
AND the user open the app to Home Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

title: Near the ballpark (> than 200 meters)
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/CLUBTOOLS-1486

As a fan attending an event who loves My History & free stuff from offers, I want the current game added to my history and all the offers unlocked when I’m in the ballpark

GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur, EXCEPT device located at the venue

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time AND also prior to after 6 hrs of game time (can be mocked)

	
(testing note: Ensure that no event check-in exists for event, prior to proceeding)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user open the app to Home Page outside of the the eligible location

** less than 200 meters
custom_expected: THEN the user should NOT be automatically checked-in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device's location is MORE than 200 meters
AND the user open the app to Home Page

** device location can be mocked using FakeGPS(android) or BP App dev tools(iOS)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is NOT shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc. (not to be shown)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is NOT shown the event listed in the user's history

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device's location is LESS than 200 meters
AND the user open the app to Home Page

** device location can be mocked using FakeGPS(android) or BP App dev tools(iOS)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

title: TODO: Multiple events (i.e double header - single admission, separate admission)
3 hours Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur, EXCEPT device time is is within 3 hrs of start time

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time (can be mocked)
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to manually check-in
custom_expected: THEN the user is shown the an error that says "Check-in opens 3 hours before the event starts."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Login with MLB account in ballpark app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Successfully logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is on Team Tab (Prod/Staging env) 
AND a game is available within 3 hours from device time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab opens with game available to checkin

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens a check in modal greater than 3 hours before the check in event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown an error that says "Check-in opens 3 hours before the event starts."

title: Enable Location Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur, EXCEPT location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time (can be mocked)


NOTE: A Checkin is possible even with imprecise location, if the coordinates provided to BP services are within the acceptable range.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN location permissions (precise) NOT enabled for Ballpark App on the device
AND a game is available within 3 hours from device time
AND user is on Team Tab (Prod/Staging env)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab opens with game available to checkin

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens a check in modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the modal should display the enable Location error screen that says "You need to turn on your location permissions to check in."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks on the "Enable Location" button.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be prompted to enable their location.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has not enabled their location, and has already said NO to the step above
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the next time the modal is opened, the "Enable Location" button should say "Settings" and take the user to settings to enable location.

title: Not At Park Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur, EXCEPT device located at the venue

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time (can be mocked)
custom_expected: THEN the "Not At Park" error screen should be shown that says "Your device thinks you're not at [BALLPARK_NAME]. You must be at the ballpark with precise location enabled to check in. (You can update your location settings from the Home tab)"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
AND user's device is NOT located at the venue
AND a game is available within 3 hours from device time
AND user is on Team Tab (Prod/Staging env)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab opens with game available to checkin

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens a check in modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the "Not At Park" error screen should be shown, stating "Your device thinks you're not at [BALLPARK_NAME]. You must be at the ballpark with precise location enabled to check in. (You can update your location settings from the Home tab)"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's device is updated to be located at the venue
custom_steps_separated.expected: *this can be achieved by mocking the location (via DevTools or FakeGPS)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is viewing "Not At Park" screen
AND user taps refresh
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the check-in modal should show allowing user to check-in successfully

title: Check In Details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time (can be mocked)
custom_expected:
THEN the default check in view is shown
The header will show for game events: the away logo, away name, home name, home team logo, date, time, park location
                     for non-game events: title of event, date, time, location

The user can enter information into the "What's happening at the ballpark?" text field
The user can enter a Section, Row, and Seat

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
AND user's device is located at the venue
AND a game is available within 3 hours from device time
AND user is on Team Tab (Prod/Staging env)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab opens with game available to checkin

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens a check in modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the default check in view is shown
*header will show for game events: the away logo, away name, home name, home team logo, date, time, park location
*header will show for non-game events: title of event, date, time, location

The user can enter information into the "What's happening at the ballpark?" text field
The user can enter a Section, Row, and Seat

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps Cancel on check IN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the modal is dismissed and the user is NOT checked in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens a check in modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the default check in view is shown
*header will show for game events: the away logo, away name, home name, home team logo, date, time, park location
*header will show for non-game events: title of event, date, time, location

The user can enter information into the "What's happening at the ballpark?" text field
The user can enter a Section, Row, and Seat

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps Done
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the modal shows a loading screen trying to check in.
If successful, then the modal closes and animates the check in button
If failure, then the modal shows the the normal state and the user can try again

title: Check In Add Photos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur
AND the user is at the check in modal

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time (can be mocked)
custom_expected: THEN the user will be given the option to open the Photo Library, Camera, or Cancel

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the ADD photo library button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is either:
1. Prompted to enable permissions for ADD photo library access
2. IF user says already said no to photo library permissions, then the user is prompted to go to settings
3. If the user has enabled permissions already and the photo library is opened.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the Camera button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is either:
1. Prompted to enable permissions for camera access
2. If user has  already said no to camera permissions, then  user is prompted to go to settings
3. If the  user has enabled permissions already then the camera is opened.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the "X" button above an added photo
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the photo is removed from the modal collection view.

title: Check in button default state
custom_preconds:
As a user, I want to be given the option to Check In to an event when I'm on the Team Tab, so I can add the game to my history and unlock offers.

GIVEN User is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the team tab
custom_expected: THEN the check in button is ALWAYS SHOWN. The color of the text is the primary color of the current team (i.e. if the current team is the Brewers, the button text would be a blue color).

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Login with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Successfully logged in with MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  the user is on the Team Tab,Check IN button should shown and text of the team turn to Blue if it's Brewers
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the check in button is ALWAYS SHOWN. The color of the text is the primary color of the current team (i.e. if the current team is the Brewers, the button text would be a blue color)

title: No Event
custom_steps: WHEN user is on a team tab WITHOUT an event scheduled for today
custom_expected: THEN the check in shows an error says "No event to check into today. Check the team’s schedule."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Successfully logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Team Tab and Check In is opened and events to check In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Check in shows an error that says "No event to check into today. Check the team’s schedule."

title: Completed a Check In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur 

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device 
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time (can be mocked)
custom_steps: WHEN the user successfully complete a check-in
custom_expected: THEN the check in button will be disabled and the text will animates to show the words "You're Checked In!" in grey.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN LogIn in with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Successfully logged in with MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the team tab, and completed Check IN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Check IN modal closes and the successfully message is shown "You're Checked In" with text displayed in gray color

title: Check In State is preserved
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in and has already checked into an event on the TEAM TAB
custom_expected: THEN the TEAM tab will still show "You're Checked In!"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Login with MLB account on Ballpark app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Successfully logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user already checked In the event on the Team tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Checked in message is shown to the user "You're Checked In"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user  kills the app and restart it again and Login with same account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Team Tab page still stows that "You're Checked In"  message
